content.question: What is the area of one petal of the polar curve <math alttext="r equals, sine, 7 theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> shown in the figure above? (Note: A petal is a loop of the curve. The curve above has seven petals.)
